p.line: Consider the _BOLDS_buggy_BOLDE_ program on the right for determining whether there is a zero in a list of numbers:
What does the program always return?
true if there is a zero in the _BOLDS_last_BOLDE_ element.
true if there is a zero in the _BOLDS_first_BOLDE_ element.

content.hint: it always overrides "found a zero!" every time, ignoring what it was in the past
